title: The Race That Changed Everything
description: Henry Ford was not a racer, but that didn't stop him from getting behind the wheel for a race that is still being talked about 110 years later.  In this video, Edsel B. Ford II tells the story of his great-grandfather and how he beat the best racer in the country with a car he built himself.
